metadata.name: Legs and ledgers #1
metadata.description:
Legs and ledgers is the genesis drop from Womxn + Crypto. Each NFT contains a fractional audio portion of Burn it Down by [@adrianaNFT](https://twitter.com/adrianaNFT) and a visual element by [@lostgirls_nft](https://twitter.com/lostgirls_nft). 

Since this drop aims to help people walk into the web3 world a little more safely, each NFT will also come with a Ledger hardware wallet, provided by Womxn + Crypto.  Once you mint, please reach out to Womxn + Crypto [womxncrypto.xyz](https://www.womxncrypto.xyz) to receive your Ledger.
